F6O1.F.summary: FLSmidth & Co. A/S supplies engineering, equipment, and services to the cement and mining industries worldwide. The company operates through Mining and Cement segments. The company also engages in the mining activities. It explores for copper, gold, iron ore, coal, and battery metals. It offers a range of products, systems, and services, including single engineered and customized equipment, such as mills, kiln systems, and clinker coolers for the cement industry; and crushers, ball mills, pumps, gravity concentrators, and thickeners or flotation cells, as well as bundled equipment solutions, full production plants, and maintenance solutions for the mining industry. The company also provides operation, maintenance, and upgrade services, as well as sells spare and wear parts. The company was founded in 1882 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

FLIDY.summary: FLSmidth & Co. A/S supplies engineering, equipment, and services to the cement and mining industries worldwide. The company operates through Mining and Cement segments. The company also engages in the mining activities. It explores for copper, gold, iron ore, coal, and battery metals. It offers a range of products, systems, and services, including single engineered and customized equipment, such as mills, kiln systems, and clinker coolers for the cement industry; and crushers, ball mills, pumps, gravity concentrators, and thickeners or flotation cells, as well as bundled equipment solutions, full production plants, and maintenance solutions for the mining industry. The company also provides operation, maintenance, and upgrade services, as well as sells spare and wear parts. The company was founded in 1882 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

FLS.CO.summary: FLSmidth & Co. A/S supplies engineering, equipment, and services to the cement and mining industries worldwide. The company operates through Mining and Cement segments. The company also engages in the mining activities. It explores for copper, gold, iron ore, coal, and battery metals. It offers a range of products, systems, and services, including single engineered and customized equipment, such as mills, kiln systems, and clinker coolers for the cement industry; and crushers, ball mills, pumps, gravity concentrators, and thickeners or flotation cells, as well as bundled equipment solutions, full production plants, and maintenance solutions for the mining industry. The company also provides operation, maintenance, and upgrade services, as well as sells spare and wear parts. The company was founded in 1882 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

GJ.CO.summary: Glunz & Jensen Holding A/S develops, produces, and supplies solutions for the prepress industry worldwide. It offers offset products, such as processors, iCtP plate writers, offset prepress products, and plateline products; and flexo products, including all-in-one systems, exposure units, processors, finishers and dryers, trimmers and mounting tables, letterpresses, and other flexo products. The company also provides spare parts kits; iCtP consumables and accessories; offset accessories; and flexo accessories, as well as after sales services. It markets its products through a network of distributors and dealers. The company was formerly known as Glunz & Jensen A/S and changed its name to Glunz & Jensen Holding A/S in December 2016. Glunz & Jensen Holding A/S was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Nyborg, Denmark.

KLEE-B.CO.summary: Brd. Klee A/S operates as an engineering and trading company in Denmark. Its products include gears and gearmotors; motors, pumps, and blowers; control and electronic products; pneumatic and hydraulic products; linear motion technology products; transmission products; machine, DIN, and norm parts; and rubber and plastic products. The company was founded in 1944 and is based in Albertslund, Denmark.

MIGA-B.CO.summary: Svejsemaskinefabrikken Migatronic A/S develops, produces, and markets welding machines and solutions in Denmark. It offers welding machines; welding equipment, such as torches, accessories, and consumables; and refurbished machines, as well as support services. The company also exports its products to approximately 40 countries. Svejsemaskinefabrikken Migatronic A/S was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Fjerritslev, Denmark.

NF1.F.summary: Nilfisk Holding A/S manufactures and sells cleaning solutions and services worldwide. The company operates through five segments: EMEA, Americas, APAC, Consumer, and Private Label and Other. It offers commercial and industrial vacuum cleaners; floor cleaning products, including single-disc, burnishers, carpet extractors, scrubber dryers, sweepers, and combination machines; outdoor products, such as utility machines, suction sweepers, street scrubbers, weed control machines, riding lawn mowers, and snow removal machines; mobile, stationary, and petrol/diesel driven pressure washers; and industry, vehicle, floor care, surface, and textile detergents, as well as care and maintenance products, and disinfectants. The company serves agriculture, automotive, beverage, building and construction, ceramics, chemical, education, electronics, food, glass, healthcare, heavy industry, hospitality, metal, optics, paper, pharmaceutical, plastic and rubber, residential areas, retail, textiles, and wood industries, as well as contract cleaners, municipalities, OEM-machine manufacturers, offices and public buildings, parks and gardens, and service contractors. It serves customers through a network of dealers and distributors, as well as through e-commerce sales. Nilfisk Holding A/S was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in BrÃ¸ndby, Denmark.

NLFSK.CO.summary: Nilfisk Holding A/S manufactures and sells cleaning solutions and services worldwide. The company operates through five segments: EMEA, Americas, APAC, Consumer, and Private Label and Other. It offers commercial and industrial vacuum cleaners; floor cleaning products, including single-disc, burnishers, carpet extractors, scrubber dryers, sweepers, and combination machines; outdoor products, such as utility machines, suction sweepers, street scrubbers, weed control machines, riding lawn mowers, and snow removal machines; mobile, stationary, and petrol/diesel driven pressure washers; and industry, vehicle, floor care, surface, and textile detergents, as well as care and maintenance products, and disinfectants. The company serves agriculture, automotive, beverage, building and construction, ceramics, chemical, education, electronics, food, glass, healthcare, heavy industry, hospitality, metal, optics, paper, pharmaceutical, plastic and rubber, residential areas, retail, textiles, and wood industries, as well as contract cleaners, municipalities, OEM-machine manufacturers, offices and public buildings, parks and gardens, and service contractors. It serves customers through a network of dealers and distributors, as well as through e-commerce sales. Nilfisk Holding A/S was founded in 1906 and is headquartered in BrÃ¸ndby, Denmark.

ODICO.CO.summary: Odico A/S manufactures formwork for the construction and wind turbine industries. It also provides consulting services, such as CAD-CAM integration, design guide and verification, parametric design and advanced modeling, project management, and project engineering services, as well as development of solutions for fabrication; and prototyping services. The company was founded in 2012 and is headquartered in Odense, Denmark.

RBLN-B.CO.summary: Roblon A/S develops, produces, and sells coated and extruded fiber solutions primarily used in the fiber optic cable and energy sectors. It provides cable fibers, including glass strength members, polyester binder yarns, aramid strength members, ripcords, cable fillers, fiber reinforced plastics, water-swellable yarns, and other products; and cable machinery for the fiber cable industry. The company also offers offshore solutions comprising orbit straps, multi straps, flex straps, clamp straps, quick straps, single and double bolt tension devices, and composite reinforcement tapes and composite fiber tapes for anti-bird caging; and high-voltage pulling ropes and coated lines. It operates in Denmark, the United Kingdom, rest of Europe, Asia, Brazil, Latin America, and the United States. The company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Frederikshavn, Denmark.

SKAKO.CO.summary: SKAKO A/S designs, develops, and sells concrete batching plants and vibratory equipment in North America, Europe, Africa, and internationally. It operates through SKAKO Concrete and SKAKO Vibration segments. The company offers admix materials, including synthetic fibers, powder pigment metering, steel fiber proportioning, and polyprophylene fibers; cleaning systems; concrete mixers comprising ATLANTIS and ROTOCONIX; CONFLEX bucket conveyors; consistency control; control systems; and Distribeton overhead gantry products. It also provides vibratory feeders, washing drums, grizzly and storage feeders, lift tippers, packaging and weigh systems, hydraulic and gear tippers, heat treatment products, on-off systems, heavy and medium duty screens, densimetric tables, flip flows, electroplating systems, and sorting and inspection systems. In addition, the company provides spare parts and after sales services. SKAKO A/S is headquartered in Faaborg, Denmark.

VWDRY.summary: Vestas Wind Systems A/S designs, manufactures, installs, and services wind turbines worldwide. The company operates in two segments, Power Solutions and Service. The Power Solutions segment sells wind power plants, wind turbines, development sites, etc. The Service segment engages in the sale of service contracts, spare parts, and related activities. The company was founded in 1898 and is headquartered in Aarhus, Denmark.

The Power Solutions segment sells wind power plants, wind turbines, development sites, etc. The Service segment engages in the sale of service contracts, spare parts, and related activities.
